front.title: PPP over Full Duplex Point-to-Point Ethernet Physical Layers

abstract.t: This document provides a definition for encapsulating the PPPprotocol directly on the various full duplex point-to-point Ethernetphysical layers. The later includes transmission bit rates of10Mbps, 100Mbps, 1Gbps, and 10Gbps. Note this is a distinct protocolfrom PPPoE, as the Ethernet frame is not existent here. All PPPpacket semantics and syntax are retained. The proposed methods inthis document may be especially useful for low cost, high bandwidthphysical channel implementations. In particular it specifies andredefines all necessary Ethernet Medium Independent Interfacefunctional 'clauses.'
